name: Turbo Soccer VR
description: Turbo Soccer VR is an ultimate football simulator created exclusively for Virtual Reality. Become a professional football player. Challenge yourself in a real-life, goal-scoring situations. Practice your skills in the arcade modes and enjoy the immersive atmosphere of the stadium!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1 or newer Processor: Intel Core i5 4590 or AMD FX 8350 or greater Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 970/AMD Radeon R9 290 equivalent or greater Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: Windows Compatible Sound Card Additional Notes: HTC Vive required
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1 or newer Processor: Intel Core i5 4590 or AMD FX 8350 or greater Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 970/AMD Radeon R9 290 equivalent or greater Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: Windows Compatible Sound Card Additional Notes: HTC Vive required
